mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user SET email = #{email}, upw = #{upw}, name = #{name}, nickname = #{nickname}, birth = #{birth}, gender = #{gender}, address = #{address}, pic = #{pic}, tel= #{tel}
mapper.select: SELECT email, name, nickname, birth, gender, address, pic, tel FROM t_user where iuser= #{iuser}
SELECT iuser, email, upw, name, nickname , birth, gender, address, pic, tel , created_at as createdAt FROM t_user WHERE email = #{email}

SELECT 0 AS checkShop, ireser, ishop, date, request, confirm, created_at AS createdAt FROM t_reservation WHERE iuser= #{iuser} UNION SELECT 1 AS checkShop, ipickup AS ireser, ibutcher AS ishop, date, request, confirm, created_at AS createdAt FROM t_pickup WHERE iuser= #{iuser} ORDER BY createdAt LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}

SELECT 0 AS checkShop, a.ireview, a.ishop, a.star, a.review, a.created_at AS createdAt FROM t_shop_review a WHERE iuser= #{iuser} UNION SELECT 1 AS checkShop, b.ireview, b.ibutcher AS ishop, b.star, b.review, b.created_at AS createdAt FROM t_but_review b WHERE iuser= #{iuser} ORDER BY createdAt desc LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}

SELECT pic FROM
t_shop_review_pic
t_but_review_pic
WHERE ireview= #{ireview}

SELECT a.imeat, a.ishop, a.name, a.information, a.location, a.x, a.y, b.created_at AS createdAt, if(b.count IS NULL, 0, b.count) AS count FROM t_shop a JOIN (SELECT ishop, COUNT(*) AS COUNT, iuser, created_at FROM t_shop_bookmark GROUP BY ishop) b ON a.ishop= b.ishop AND b.iuser= #{iuser} UNION SELECT 0 AS imeat, a.ibutcher AS ishop, a.name, a.information, a.location, a.x, a.y, b.created_at AS createdAt, if(b.count IS NULL, 0, b.count) AS count FROM t_butcher_shop a JOIN (SELECT ibutcher, COUNT(*) AS COUNT, iuser, created_at FROM t_but_bookmark GROUP BY ibutcher) b ON a.ibutcher= b.ibutcher AND b.iuser= #{iuser} ORDER BY createdAt desc LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}
